###Keyword###
Func OnAutoItStart ()...EndFunc

###Description###
Defines a user-defined function that will be called before the script start.

###Syntax###
<b>Func OnAutoItStart ( )</b>
	...
<b>EndFunc</b>


###Parameters###
None.


###Remarks###
The name of the function cannot be changed as it can for the "OnAutoItExit".

###Related###
<a href="FuncOnAutoItExit.htm">Func OnAutoItExit ()</a>, <a href="..\functions\AutoItSetOption.htm#OnExitFunc">OnExitFunc (Option)</a>
